project_abstract.cdata: The project would support the Government's objective to improve the national road network by upgrading and intensifying road maintenance operations. Its aim is to establish an initial four-year program of maintenance on 780 kms of high-priority roads which would include provision of: (a) equipment, vehicles, and spare parts; (b) materials and supplies to overcome the current backlog of periodic maintenance; (c) a weighing bridge; (d) technical assistance and training for PED; (e) consulting services for studies of a follow-up maintenance program and exploration of aggregates for paved road surfacing; and (f) a mechanical engineering scholarship.
